text: Egha a kurugha nguibar ekiamɨn azenan ghugha, egha maghɨrama dagɨabar a ginifi. Egha akam a gasir darasi uan azenan azuir korotiaba suegha egha gumazir igiam, an ziam Solɨn dagarimningɨn a da arɨsi.(7:58) Moses Osirizir Araziba ghaze, gumazitam arazir kuram damightɨ, me a inigh nguibamɨn azenan mangɨ dagɨaba isɨ a ginivightɨ, an aremegham. Nɨ Wok Pris 24:13-16, ko Namba 15:35ɨn gan.
